titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Federal Credit Union Month and recognizing the importance of Federal credit unions to the economy, and their critical mission in serving those of modest means.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Mr. Kanjorski moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 658.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

bill.summary: 9/24/2007--Passed House without amendment. Supports the goals and ideals of Federal Credit Union Month.Recognizes the importance of federal credit unions to the economy, and their critical mission in serving those of modest means.
